message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the problem of maximizing the service capacity region of accessing erasure coded content in cloud storage systems. This involves optimizing the allocation of requests between systematic nodes and repair groups, as well as choosing the underlying erasure code. Therefore, the paper is likely to belong to the Information Theory (cs.IT), Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC), Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS), Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI), and Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-categories.
